content.text: I am doing great! How about you?
I am doing well, thanks! I am a software engineer who loves Halloween and pasta.
Nice! I have a wedding planning business that took off after I had my home featured in a magazine for being the cleanest in the city.
That's awesome! I have been with my partner for five years now. We love to watch Face Off together.
That's great! I spend most of my days working at my church's food pantry. I love to help people.
That's so nice of you! I love to eat my mom's home cooked meals. She's the best cook!
Apples are my favorite fruit. They are healthy and sweet.
I love pasta! I'm terrible at math, though.
That's okay! I love math. It's so interesting to me.
I'm glad you like it! It's not for everyone.
So, what else do you like to do?
I love to spend time with my cat. He's the light of my life.
That's so cute! I love cats. I have a dog, but I love cats too.
Dogs are great too! I'm glad you have a pet. They make life so much better.
